short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Trusted results from wherever you are on the web, from Knovel, an Elsevier product

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Knovel is the leading engineering knowledge platform that connects organizations to information and tools from the world's most trusted technical content providers.

Bring the power of Knovel along as you search the web. The handy Knovel browser extension integrates seamlessly with Google, Bing, or Baidu, intelligently alerting you when Knovel offers relevant content for your search topic. Simply click the prompt links to instantly view robust information within the Knovel platform itself. You have full control - use the extension to augment all searches or selectively enable it for targeted inquiries. Let this unobtrusive tool be your guide to robust Knovel resources as you navigate the vastness of the web.
